entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
